titlestmt.titleproper: Documents Relating to Missions in Chihuahua and Sonora (Mexico) 1698-1798
Documents Relating to Missions in Chihuahua and Sonora (Mexico)

change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Documents Relating to Missions in Chihuahua and Sonora (Mexico) 1698-1798
did.abstract: Photocopies of original holograph manuscripts accompanied by Spanish transcriptions and English translations by Campbell W. Pennington. Includes Relación de la fundación y aumento, y estado presente de estas dos misiones, Nabogame y Baburigame, de letra del Padre Benito Rinaldini, 1763? (accompanied by a list of missions in Chihuahua and Sonora); Estado de esta visitacion de Nuestra Señora del Pilar de Norogáchic hasta la presente visita del Padre Visitador General Joseph de Herrera, 1698; Derrotero cierto para ir de este Janos al Moqui.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

did.langmaterial: Materials are in Spanish with partial English translation.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Documents Relating to Missions in Chihuahua and Sonora (Mexico) (MS 180). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul M. Roca, 1980.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Photocopies of original holograph manuscripts accompanied by Spanish transcriptions and English translations by Campbell W. Pennington. Includes Relación de la fundación y aumento, y estado presente de estas dos misiones, Nabogame y Baburigame, de letra del Padre Benito Rinaldini, 1763? (accompanied by a list of missions in Chihuahua and Sonora); Estado de esta visitacion de Nuestra Señora del Pilar de Norogáchic hasta la presente visita del Padre Visitador General Joseph de Herrera, 1698; Derrotero cierto para ir de este Janos al Moqui.

relatedmaterial.p: Photocopy. Original located in Austin, Tx : University of Texas, W. B. Stephens Collection.
